import React,{useState}from'react';import'./DialogueComponent.css';import Panel from'../core/Panel';import jsonData from'../../tabs/Conv11103.json';import emotionMap from'../../data/emotionMap';import actNum from'../../data/daLabelsDict';import EDAs from'../../data/daMap';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ConversationVisualization(data){const[selectedConversation,setSelectedConversation]=useState(null);const handleRowClick=conversation=>{if(selectedConversation===conversation){setSelectedConversation(null);}else{setSelectedConversation(conversation);}};const conversations=Object.entries(data)[0][1];//jsonData[0]["Table 1"];
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"table-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title-text",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Utterance Data for Conversation ID: ",conversations[0].conv_id," "]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Utterance #"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Emotion"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Sentiment Switch"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Act"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Predicted Act"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Dialogue Text"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:conversations.map((conversation,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{onClick:()=>handleRowClick(conversation),className:"".concat(selectedConversation===conversation?"selected":''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:index}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:emotionMap[conversation.topic]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:conversation.speaker===0?'No':'Yes'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:EDAs[actNum[conversation.act]]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"".concat(conversation.act===conversation.DApredict?"correct":"incorrect"),children:EDAs[actNum[conversation.DApredict]]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:conversation.text})]},"".concat(conversation.conv_id,"_").concat(index)))})]})]});}
